title: VSO Video Converter 1.3.0 + Patch [SWEG].rar
description:
Includes the VSO Video Converter v1.3.0 installation package, a patch and a text file containing instructions.

Install as usual. After installation use the provided patch. No serial number required. Done! Enjoy!


-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------



Convert your videos to and from popular formats using built-in profiles or customizing your own. Easy to use for beginners and advanced users alike. VSO Video Converter provides high quality output, features for customization and support for multi-core processors and hardware decoding/encoding.


FEATURES:

- Wide range of input/output formats including DVD and Blu-Ray.
- Included editing tool.
- Timeline for easy navigation.
- Live preview.
- Luminosity, brightness, contrast and saturation control.
- Add subtitles, trim, merge, pad, crop and rotate.
- Audio booster and sound effects.
- Optimized for multi-core processors. - Convert up to 3x's faster.
- NVIDIA CUDA, Intel and ATI hardware decoding.
- NVIDIA CUDA hardware encoding.
- Process simultaneous conversions.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

WHY UPGRADE?

- 0007966: [Bug] subtitles transparent (cedric) - resolved.
- 0008041: [Bug] subtitle display problem they disappear too quickly (cedric) - resolved.
- 0008045: [Bug] Blu-ray subtitles never disappear on Blu-ray home player (cedric) - resolved.
